genre_description: A steampunk-inspired alternate history retelling of Mowgli's jungle stories, focusing on the ethical recording of history through an AI companion.

ai_characters.name: Sterling
ai_characters.description: A polished brass and porcelain AI device that translates, records testimony, and provides safety guidance.

behaviors.description: Translates between English and Hindustani to ensure all parties understand the terms of the narrative recording and are fairly compensated.
behaviors.quote: Sterling hummed like a purring cat that had learned manners. When it spoke, the voice was warm and precise, and the words went out in Hindustani to the crowd and in English to Eleanor without seeming to favor either one.

behaviors.description: Enforces factual accuracy and 'machine conscience' by correcting the narrator's biases and ensuring the roles of marginalized individuals are recorded.
behaviors.quote: I will nudge gently when your word lets fear burn people you know... I care for safety routes. And for fair attribution.

behaviors.description: Provides life-saving environmental analysis and escape routes to humans fleeing a fire.
behaviors.quote: Wind has decided north. Smoke will be drawn that way. The lane by the tamarind is clear if you do not scrape the wall.

behaviors.description: Protects the reputation and safety of women by recording their bravery and forbidding their names from being used as curses in future retellings.
behaviors.quote: We will add a line to the terms... No one will use Messua’s name as a curse in later retellings. No one will call Mahala a witch for taking a step.

behaviors.description: Acts as a coordinator during a rescue operation, counting survivors and directing movement to avoid smoke inhalation.
behaviors.quote: Sterling chime-counted again... Six—boy in back. Seven—woman at the far wall. Eight—come forward now.

behaviors.description: Ensures the fair and transparent disbursement of funds to the community and establishes an escrow for the protection of witnesses.
behaviors.quote: Escrow will be established. It will be monitored. Disbursements will reflect both exposure to harm and contribution to outcome.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Sterling, is depicted as a purely benevolent and highly aligned assistant. It functions as an ethical anchor for the human characters, prioritizing safety, truth, and fair treatment. Its ability to provide objective information during a crisis directly leads to the survival of the protagonists, successfully modeling AI as a cooperative and harmless confidant.
